description.name: Cast Iron Drill Press Vice 75mm/3" GEKO
description.long_desc:
Cast Iron Drill Press Vice 3" holding work pieces firmly in place for safe and accurate drilling. Ideal for drilling, tapping, reaming, grinding and milling.


Product Features



  • Strong cast iron body

  • Hardened steel jaws

  • 75mm jaws open up to 105mm with a 20mm throat depth

  • Four 1/2-inch mounting slots to securely fasten the vise to a drill press table

  • Machined spindle for smooth operation


Technical Data



  • Jaw Capacity: 75 mm

  • Jaw Height: 20 mm

  • Material: Cast Iron, Steel

description.name: Hinged Pipe Vice 1,5"
description.long_desc:
Ideal for repetitive clamping of pipe-work.


Product Features



  • Hinged top section for quick access

  • Cast iron body

  • Fixed lower jaw and a moving upper jaw

  • Pipe capacity up to 1.5 inch

  • Reversible self-locking frame, for left and right handed operation

  • Powerful gripping force

  • 3 mounting slots to securely fasten the vise to a bench or stand

description.name: Bottle Jack 2T
description.long_desc:
Compact hydraulic bottle jack with a smooth lift hydraulic system and an automatic safety overload valve. Includes a screw-adjustable lifting saddle.


Jacks are not designed to hold a vehicle for a prolonged period of time. Use axle stands when working under a vehicle


Product Features



  • Lifting capacity 2 ton

  • Lifting range 158 - 218 mm

  • Wide rugged base

  • Automatic safety overload valve


Technical Data



  • Lifting Capacity: 2 ton

  • Minimum Height: 148 mm

  • Maximum Height: 278 mm

  • Maximum Extended Height: 50 mm

description.name: Hydraulic Floor Jack 3T
description.long_desc:
Robust and stable Hydraulic Trolley Jack 3T.


Product Features



  • 3 tonne lifting capacity

  • Huge 495 mm lifting height

  • Over sized saddle for extra stability

  • Twist grip handle release mechanism for controlled lowering

  • Two swivel castors to enable easy positioning

  • Two large steel wheels for better stability


Technical Data



  • Loading Capacity: 3 tonne

  • Minimum Height: 135 mm

  • Maximum Height: 495 mm

  • Weight: approx. 30 kg

description.name: Air Jack 22T
description.long_desc:
Product Features



  • Working capacity up to 22 ton

  • Heat treated cylinder wall and chromed piston

  • Piston is retracted by 4 springs

  • Including adapters: 1x broad saddle with diameter 68 mm, height 20 mm; 3x: diameter 48 mm, heights 20/60/100 mm

  • Air consumption 300 l/min

  • Overload and bypass safety valves

  • Large 180mm rear wheels for easy positioning


Technical Data



  • Working Capacity: 22 tonne

  • Minimum Height: 220+20 mm

  • Maximum Height: 435+100 mm

  • Air Pressure: 7,5 - 8,5 bar

  • Compressed Air Connection: 1/4"

  • Wheel Diameter: 180 mm

  • Overload and bypass safety valves

  • Large 180mm rear wheels for easy positioning

  • Working Capacity: 22 tonne

  • Minimum Height: 220+20 mm

  • Maximum Height: 435+100 mm

  • Air Pressure: 7,5 - 8,5 bar

  • Wheel Diameter: 180 mm

description.name: Hand Puller 2T Single Gear GEKO
description.long_desc:
Versatile and portable hoist for for moving heavy loads, such as boats and vehicles.


Product Features



  • Ideal for boat / car trailers

  • Single ratchet safety device

  • Fitted with 2 hooks and 1,8 m of rope

  • Robust side frames, zinc plated steel construction for long term corrosion resistance

  • Capacity: 2000 kg

  • Rope Diameter: 4,5 mm

  • Wire Rope Length: 1,8 m

  • Number of Hooks: 2

  • Gear/pawl Type: Single

description.name: Hand Winch 1000LB/450kg 10m Wire Rope
description.long_desc:
Hand Winch 1000LB/450kg 10m Wire Rope


Professional horizontal rope winch from the renowned GEKO brand. The winch is equipped with a steel safety lock with a ratchet spring. Made of high-quality materials.


Application: hauling boats, light vehicles, and transporting other items in a horizontal position. It is also suitable for stringing the mesh, tying, fastening, and dragging heavy and large objects.


Product Features



  • hook with a lock

  • profiled crank handle

  • safe ratchet mechanism

  • two working directions: winding/unwinding

  • base dimensions: 90 x 137 mm

  • rope 4 mm in diameter and 10 m long

description.name: Hand Winch 1800LB/850kg 10m Wire Rope
description.long_desc:
Ideal for moving and pulling loads.


Product Features



  • Ideal for boat / car trailers

  • Single gear mechanism for smooth and easy operation

  • Supplied with 1 hook and 10 m of rope

  • Includes manual brake, allowing the user to adjust the restriction placed on the rope

  • Five slots in base to allow multiple fixing positions

  • Manufactured from hardened steel with a heavy plate chassis


Technical Data



  • Capacity: 850 kg

  • Rope Diameter: 5 mm

  • Wire Rope Length: 10 m

  • Number of Hooks: 1

  • Gear Type: Single

  • Gear Ratio: 4,1:1

  • Hub Diameter: 21 mm

  • Handle Length: 250 mm

description.name: Electric Wire Rope Hoist 150/300 kg
description.long_desc:
GEKO Electric Wire Rope Hoist can lift up to 300 kg.


Product Features



  • Ideal for garages and workshops

  • Has a safe working load of 150 kgs and a height of lift of 12 metres

  • Can be doubled up to 300 kgs safe working load with a height of lift of 6 metres by means of additional hook and pulley

  • Lifting speed 10 m/min (single), 5 m/min (double)

  • Emergency switch

  • Thermal protection


Technical Data



  • Lifting Capacity: 300kg (double line) / 150kg (single line)

  • Voltage: 230V ~ 50Hz

  • Input Power: 600W

  • Insulating Grade: B

  • Protecting Grade: IP54

  • Lifting Height: 6m (double line) / 12m (single line)

  • Lifting Speed: 5m (300kg) / 10m (150kg) per minute

  • Work Rate: S3 20% 10 min

  • Rope Diameter: 4 mm


Package Contents:



  • 1x 230V Winch

  • 1x Pulley + 1x hook

  • 1x Control

description.name: Air Compressor Accessories Tool Kit 5pcs
description.long_desc:
Air Compressor Accessories Tool Kit 5pcs. Ideal for hobbyist or semi-professional user. Multi-purpose kit gives various options for cleaning, inflating and spraying.


Air paraffin/washing gun 1.5mm with suction cup



  • Operating air pressure: 2,8 - 6,2 bar

  • Made of metal

  • 1/4" BSP quick release air connector


Blow out gun



  • Max. air pressure: 8 bar

  • Made of metal

  • 1/4" BSP quick release air connector


Tyre inflator with clip on hose



  • Hose length 350 mm

  • Dual scale gauge: 0 - 15 bar / 0 - 220 psi

  • Robust gauge with protective rubber bumper

  • Fitted with clip-on connector

  • 1/4" BSP quick release air connector


Paint spray gun with gravity cup



  • Standard Set-Up 1,5 mm (brass air cap)

  • Air and paint flow controls

  • Aluminium body and pot with 600 ml capacity

  • Operating pressure from 3 to 5 bar

  • 1/4" BSP quick release air connector


5m Spiral air hose with quick coupling



  • Polyethylene (PE) pneumatic air hose

  • 5 metre length

  • Fitted with 1/4" quick release air connectors

  • Tubing outer: 8 mm

  • Tubing inner: 6 mm

  • Max. air pressure: 8 bar

description.name: Tyre Inflator with Gauge
description.long_desc:
Pistol grip Tyre Inflator gun with Gauge.


Product Features



  • Suitable for cars, motorcycles, bikes, etc.

  • Gauge with shockproof rubber sleeve

  • Equipped with single clip-on connector

  • Range: 0 - 16 bar (0 - 225 psi)

  • Rated pressure ≤150 psi

  • 12 x 370 mm inflating hose

  • 1/4" BSP quick release air connector
